title: Duplicate Charge Resolution
body: If the customer reports duplicate charge for same merchant within 5 minutes, initiate investigation and refund one transaction.

title: Failed Login Escalation
body: If more than 3 failed logins detected in under 10 minutes, trigger OTP verification for the next login attempt.
